name: Mara Jade's Lightsaber
Lore: 'As part of her training to become the Emperor''s hand, Mara Jade learned from Palpatine himself how to effectively fight with a lightsaber.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on Mara Jade. May add 1 to Force Drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.',
